leve.name: Exotic Remedies (L)
leve.description: With the opening of the road to the Churning Mists, there is the tantalizing possibility of plants which exist only in the Dravanian home with remedial properties not yet known to medical science. I can only leave it to imagination as to what exotic vegetation may aid and strengthen our knights until I can acquire living samples to be subject to testing.
leve.client: Temple Knights Hospitalier Captain Abel Whitecape
